query.statement:
SELECT M17.MANDT AS MANDT , M17.INVNR AS INVNR , M17.POSID AS POSID , CASE WHEN MAX(PR.ZZGUBUN) = '13' THEN VALUE((SELECT VALUE FROM SAPHEE.ZSDT0005 WHERE MANDT= M17.MANDT AND HOGI = SUBSTR(M17.POSID,1,9) AND CHARACTERISTIC = 'EL_ECN' ORDER BY SEQ DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY),M17.POST1) ELSE M17.POST1 END AS POST1 , MAX(CASE WHEN M17.POTYPE = '' THEN (CASE WHEN M17.BOX_CK = '24' THEN (CASE WHEN M8_1.EWBEZ = 'OPTION BOX' THEN MM011.MATNR_NM ELSE M8_1.EWBEZ END) ELSE M8.EWBEZ END) ELSE M17.MATNR END) AS MATNR , CASE WHEN MAX(M17.BOX_CK) = '24' THEN (CASE WHEN MAX(M17.EXTWG) = 'BOX24' THEN SUM(M17.MENGE) ELSE 1 END ) ELSE (1) END AS MENGE , MAX(M17.MEINS) AS MEINS , MAX(M17.EXTWG) AS EXTWG , M17.INVTAG , CASE WHEN MAX(M17.EXTWG) IS NULL OR MAX(M17.EXTWG) = '' OR (MAX(M17.BOX_CK) = '' AND MAX(M17.EXTWG) = 'BOX33') OR (MAX(M17.BOX_CK) = '24' AND MAX(M17.EXTWG)='BOX24') THEN (CASE WHEN MAX(MM025.SHIPDAT1) IS NULL THEN '00000000' WHEN MAX(MM011.BLOCK_NO) = '' THEN (CASE WHEN MAX(SUBSTR(M17.POSID,7,2)) = 'NC' THEN MAX(PP027.ILDAT) ELSE MAX(MM025.SHIPDAT2) END) WHEN MAX(MM011.BLOCK_NO) LIKE 'A%' THEN (CASE WHEN MAX(SUBSTR(M17.POSID,7,2)) = 'NC' THEN MAX(PP027.ILDAT) ELSE MAX(MM025.SHIPDAT1) END) WHEN MAX(MM011.BLOCK_NO) LIKE 'B%' THEN (CASE WHEN MAX(SUBSTR(M17.POSID,7,2)) = 'NC' THEN MAX(PP027.ILDAT) ELSE MAX(MM025.SHIPDAT2) END) WHEN MAX(MM011.BLOCK_NO) LIKE 'C%' THEN (CASE WHEN MAX(SUBSTR(M17.POSID,7,2)) = 'NC' THEN MAX(PP027.ILDAT) ELSE MAX(MM025.SHIPDAT3) END) WHEN MAX(MM011.BLOCK_NO) LIKE 'D%' THEN (CASE WHEN MAX(SUBSTR(M17.POSID,7,2)) = 'NC' THEN MAX(PP027.ILDAT) ELSE MAX(MM025.SHIPDAT4) END) WHEN MAX(MM011.BLOCK_NO) LIKE 'E%' THEN (CASE WHEN MAX(SUBSTR(M17.POSID,7,2)) = 'NC' THEN MAX(PP027.ILDAT) ELSE MAX(MM025.SHIPDAT5) END) ELSE '00000000' END) ELSE (CASE ( CASE WHEN MAX(M17.BOX_CK) = '24' THEN (SELECT VALUE(SUBSTR(BLOCK,1,1),'') FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT026_1 WHERE MANDT= M17.MANDT AND BOXNO = MAX(M17.EXTWG)) ELSE (SELECT VALUE(SUBSTR(BLOCK,1,1),'') FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT026 WHERE MANDT= M17.MANDT AND BOXNO = MAX(M17.EXTWG)) END ) WHEN '1' THEN (CASE WHEN MAX(SUBSTR(M17.POSID,7,2)) = 'NC' THEN MAX(PP027.ILDAT) ELSE MAX(MM025.SHIPDAT1) END) WHEN '2' THEN (CASE WHEN MAX(SUBSTR(M17.POSID,7,2)) = 'NC' THEN MAX(PP027.ILDAT) ELSE MAX(MM025.SHIPDAT2) END) WHEN '3' THEN (CASE WHEN MAX(SUBSTR(M17.POSID,7,2)) = 'NC' THEN MAX(PP027.ILDAT) ELSE MAX(MM025.SHIPDAT3) END) WHEN '4' THEN (CASE WHEN MAX(SUBSTR(M17.POSID,7,2)) = 'NC' THEN MAX(PP027.ILDAT) ELSE MAX(MM025.SHIPDAT4) END) WHEN '5' THEN (CASE WHEN MAX(SUBSTR(M17.POSID,7,2)) = 'NC' THEN MAX(PP027.ILDAT) ELSE MAX(MM025.SHIPDAT5) END) ELSE '00000000' END) END AS SHIPDAT , ma02.posid_old AS POOLD, ma02.posid_dong AS PODONG FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT017 AS M17 LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMMT008 AS M8 ON M17.MANDT = M8.MANDT AND M8.EXTWG = (CASE WHEN COALESCE(M17.EXTWG,'') = '' THEN (CASE WHEN M17.BOX_CK = '24' THEN 'BOX24' ELSE 'BOX33' END) ELSE M17.EXTWG END) LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMMT011 AS MM011 ON M17.MANDT = MM011.MANDT AND M17.MATNR = MM011.MATNR LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMMT025 AS MM025 ON M17.MANDT = MM025.MANDT AND SUBSTR(M17.POSID,1,9) = MM025.POSID AND MM025.PSTYPE = '02' LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMMT008_1 AS M8_1 ON M17.MANDT = M8_1.MANDT AND M8_1.EXTWG = (CASE WHEN COALESCE(M17.EXTWG,'') = '' THEN (CASE WHEN M17.BOX_CK = '24' THEN 'BOX24' ELSE 'BOX33' END) ELSE M17.EXTWG END) LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.PRPS AS PR ON M17.MANDT= PR.MANDT AND M17.POSID = PR.POSID LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPPT027 AS PP027 ON M17.MANDT = PP027.MANDT AND M17.POSID = PP027.POSID AND PP027.ACTIV = '05' AND PP027.BLOCK = 'A' AND PP027.GUBUN = '01' LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMaster02 AS MA02 ON M17.MANDT = MA02.MANDT AND SUBSTR(M17.POSID,1,9) = MA02.POSID_1
WHERE M17.MANDT= #G_MANDT# #INVNR+# AND M17.PRO_F > '0' GROUP BY M17.MANDT, M17.INVNR, M17.POSID, M17.POST1, M17.INVTAG, ma02.posid_old, ma02.posid_dong ORDER BY INVNR, POSID, EXTWG, INVTAG FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
